import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

Environment (or 'env') commands allow the user to configure the properties for the environment in use.

## get

The `temporal env get` command prints the environmental properties for the environment in use.

For example, passing the 'local' [Namespace](/namespaces#) <span id="i-00989c81-76be-4bf7-8413-8e6874d67fb1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-00989c81-76be-4bf7-8413-8e6874d67fb1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-00989c81-76be-4bf7-8413-8e6874d67fb1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Namespace?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Namespace is a unit of isolation within the Temporal Platform</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> returns the name, address, and certificate paths for the local environment.
`temporal env get local`
`Output: tls-cert-path  /home/my-user/certs/cluster.cert tls-key-path   /home/my-user/certs/cluster.key address        127.0.0.1:7233 namespace      accounting`

Output can be narrowed down to a specific option.
`temporal env get local.tls-key-path`
`tls-key-path  /home/my-user/certs/cluster.key`

Use the options listed below to change the command's behavior.

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-4a184ec6-13c1-4d2e-9290-bd32e7831574" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-4a184ec6-13c1-4d2e-9290-bd32e7831574" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-4a184ec6-13c1-4d2e-9290-bd32e7831574" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--limit](/cli/cmd-options#limit) <span id="i-fcd52527-76ba-4d8c-9a7e-838bead1fe08" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-fcd52527-76ba-4d8c-9a7e-838bead1fe08" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-fcd52527-76ba-4d8c-9a7e-838bead1fe08" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal limit</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Number of items to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--no-pager](/cli/cmd-options#no-pager) <span id="i-a3e6eac6-04e4-4f06-bf59-64a771adff19" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-a3e6eac6-04e4-4f06-bf59-64a771adff19" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-a3e6eac6-04e4-4f06-bf59-64a771adff19" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal no-pager</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Disables the interactive pager.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">pager</span></div></div>

- [--output](/cli/cmd-options#output) <span id="i-5a751594-5e62-47ee-879a-9d513712576d" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-5a751594-5e62-47ee-879a-9d513712576d" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-5a751594-5e62-47ee-879a-9d513712576d" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal output</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Output format.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--pager](/cli/cmd-options#pager) <span id="i-88a94898-d862-4c5e-9336-ba2622fe1031" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-88a94898-d862-4c5e-9336-ba2622fe1031" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-88a94898-d862-4c5e-9336-ba2622fe1031" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal pager</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Sets the pager for Temporal CLI to use.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">pager</span></div></div>

## set

The `temporal env set` command sets the value for an environmental property.

Properties can be set for the entire system, such as the frontend address:
`temporal env set local.address 127.0.0.1:7233`

Use the options listed below to change the command's behavior.

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-cfffbd5a-54fa-4270-83d1-27e4e89325fc" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-cfffbd5a-54fa-4270-83d1-27e4e89325fc" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-cfffbd5a-54fa-4270-83d1-27e4e89325fc" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--limit](/cli/cmd-options#limit) <span id="i-1826b3a0-ba04-455a-95aa-58c77516e9fa" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1826b3a0-ba04-455a-95aa-58c77516e9fa" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1826b3a0-ba04-455a-95aa-58c77516e9fa" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal limit</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Number of items to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--no-pager](/cli/cmd-options#no-pager) <span id="i-db536240-54f2-411b-81bb-b891dc175e14" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-db536240-54f2-411b-81bb-b891dc175e14" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-db536240-54f2-411b-81bb-b891dc175e14" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal no-pager</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Disables the interactive pager.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">pager</span></div></div>

## delete

The `temporal env delete` command deletes a given environment or environmental property.

Deleting a given environment (such as 'local') and its saved values is achieved by passing a valid [Namespace](/namespaces#) <span id="i-d82f66f5-39b7-470d-b33b-57145c189731" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-d82f66f5-39b7-470d-b33b-57145c189731" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-d82f66f5-39b7-470d-b33b-57145c189731" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Namespace?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Namespace is a unit of isolation within the Temporal Platform</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> name.

`temporal env delete local`

Use the options listed below to change the command's behavior.

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-55872240-08c4-43ef-800f-720a62689932" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-55872240-08c4-43ef-800f-720a62689932" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-55872240-08c4-43ef-800f-720a62689932" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--limit](/cli/cmd-options#limit) <span id="i-d4fe6b04-fcce-4520-9a85-de80bcfb1b60" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-d4fe6b04-fcce-4520-9a85-de80bcfb1b60" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-d4fe6b04-fcce-4520-9a85-de80bcfb1b60" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal limit</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Number of items to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>
